Audio.Locality: Finca La Carbonera (canon del rio Toche), Tolima
Audio.Author: Bernabe Lopez-Lanus
Audio.Comments: Record first included in G. polyosoma (I must study my notes, but by precaution , by now, I prefer nominate this record like G. albicaudatus, toghether with the other albicaudatus record, at the same place: Finca La Carbonera).
